## cartesianToHex() function

Convert a cartesian coordinate to a hex coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function cartesianToHex(coordinate: CartesianCoordinate, size: number): HexCoordinate;
```

**Returns:**

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)

The coordinate of the hex that contains the given cartesian coordinate.
